description: Powers of 3 written in base 12. (Next term contains a non-decimal character).
comments: Comment from Neven Juric, Apr 20 2008: If we use hexadecimal characters, the sequence can be extended as follows: 1, 3, 9, 23, 69, 183, 509, 1323, 3969, b483, 2a209, 86623, 217669, 64a783, ...
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
